name: MostaScene
description:
MostaScene is a narrative game conceived and structured to tell the story of the 5 district of Padova (Armistizio - Savonarola) with a particular focus on the Palestro district. Thanks to a small narrative device, those who play are led to meet various realities of the neigborhood and to learn about and to learn about its stories, its present, and imaging a possible future.

Game design

Andreaucci Enrico, Berton Arrigo, Bianchi Federica Maria, Di Domenico Azzurra

Artist

Favaretto Arianna, Perego Sara, Sabadini Arianna

Programmer

Prebianca Pietro, Rizzolo Micheal

This game is realized for the platformUrban Histories Reload (website: https://www.urbanhistories.it/)
